short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for an item on Amazon using the right click context menu from any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the Shopping Easy Search for Amazon and search for selected text on Amazon using the right click context menu from any website(i.e. amazon.com, amazon.co.uk, amazon.de, amazon.es, amazon.fr, amazon.ca, amazon.co.jp).
